name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - P | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
I will give you three clues, and you must answer the clues. Just type the longest word, NOT all three. The first clue begins with a P, the second word drops the first letter, and the third words drops the first letter one more time. For instance, if the clue reads "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink", but to answer, you will only type the longest word, in this case "Drink". Remember, only type the longest word in as your answer!

We'll start things off with a foursome!

Top part of the inside of a mouth - Winged - Tardy - Eaten

This time, FIVE clues!

Part of horse's foot above the hoof - Backward - Strict - Type of bird - Another type of bird
questions.explanation:
